summary: This is an email forwarding a New York Law Journal article (dated May 6, 2020) about the Epstein case. The email is sent from an individual in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) to another, sharing the article for informational purposes.

persons.name: Chief, Criminal Division
persons.context: The recipient of the email forwarding the NYLJ article. The title indicates a senior legal position within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Publication of NYLJ Article
events.description: A New York Law Journal article about the Epstein case is published.

events.title: Email Forwarding Article
events.description: An email is sent within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the SDNY, forwarding the NYLJ article to the Chief of the Criminal Division.

locations: United States Attorney's Office, SDNY (Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: Internal communication within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the Epstein case.
References a New York Law Journal article published on May 6, 2020, concerning the case.
Demonstrates ongoing interest and information sharing about the case within the prosecuting office in May 2020.
